og.title: Q&A with Mark Duggan, new director of SIEPR

twitter.description: Three weeks ago, professor of economics Mark Duggan assumed the directorship of the Stanford Institute for Economic Policy Research (SIEPR). The Daily sat down with him to hear about his plans for expanding undergraduate research in economic policy and better communicating research to policymakers.
twitter.title: Q&A with Mark Duggan, new director of SIEPR
twitter.creator: @Stanford_Daily
